title: Authorizes the commissioner of economic development to promulgate rules and regulations governing the establishment of agricultural empire zones
summary: Authorizes the commissioner of economic development to promulgate rules and regulations governing the establishment of agricultural empire zones based on the rules and regulations that govern the states empire zones program.

                                         2791

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  CROUCH, KOLB, BURLING, OAKS -- read once and
         referred to the  Committee  on  Economic  Development,  Job  Creation,
         Commerce and Industry

       AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the establish-
         ment of agricultural empire zones

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The general municipal law is amended by adding a new  arti-
    2  cle 18-D to read as follows:
    3                                 ARTICLE 18-D
    4                          AGRICULTURAL EMPIRE ZONES
    5  SECTION 971. SHORT TITLE.
    6          972. STATEMENT OF LEGISLATIVE FINDINGS AND INTENT.
    7          973. ESTABLISHMENT OF AGRICULTURAL EMPIRE ZONES.
    8    S  971.  SHORT  TITLE. THIS ARTICLE SHALL BE KNOWN AND MAY BE CITED AS
    9  THE "NEW YORK STATE AGRICULTURAL EMPIRE ZONES ACT".
   10    S 972. STATEMENT OF LEGISLATIVE FINDINGS  AND  INTENT.  IT  IS  HEREBY
   11  FOUND  AND  DECLARED  THAT THERE EXIST WITHIN THE STATE CERTAIN AGRICUL-
   12  TURAL AREAS CHARACTERIZED BY PERSISTENT AND PERVASIVE  POVERTY,  LIMITED
   13  NEW  AGRICULTURE  INDUSTRY OPPORTUNITIES, A DEPENDENCE ON PUBLIC ASSIST-
   14  ANCE INCOME, DILAPIDATED AND ABANDONED  FARMS  AND  AGRICULTURE  RELATED
   15  INDUSTRIAL  FACILITIES, AND SHRINKING TAX BASES. THESE SEVERE CONDITIONS
   16  REQUIRE STATE GOVERNMENT TO TARGET FOR THESE AREAS EXTRAORDINARY ECONOM-
   17  IC AND AGRICULTURE RELATED DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS IN  ORDER  TO  STIMULATE
   18  PRIVATE  INVESTMENT,  AND PRIVATE AGRICULTURAL BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT.  IT
   19  IS THE PUBLIC POLICY OF  THE  STATE  TO  OFFER  SPECIAL  INCENTIVES  AND
   20  ASSISTANCE  THAT WILL PROMOTE THE DEVELOPMENT OF NEW AGRICULTURAL INDUS-
   21  TRIES AND BUSINESSES AND THE EXPANSION OF  EXISTING  AGRICULTURAL  BUSI-
   22  NESSES WITHIN THESE ECONOMICALLY IMPOVERISHED AREAS AND TO DO SO WITHOUT
   23  ENCOURAGING  THE  RELOCATION  OF  AGRICULTURAL  BUSINESS INVESTMENT FROM
   24  OTHER AREAS OF THE STATE. IT IS FURTHER FOUND AND DECLARED  THAT  IT  IS

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04740-01-1

       A. 2791                             2

    1  THE PUBLIC POLICY OF THE STATE TO ACHIEVE THESE GOALS THROUGH THE MUTUAL
    2  COOPERATION OF ALL LEVELS OF STATE AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT AND THE BUSINESS
    3  COMMUNITY.
    4    S  973. ESTABLISHMENT OF AGRICULTURAL EMPIRE ZONES. AFTER CONSULTATION
    5  WITH THE COMMISSIONER OF AGRICULTURE AND MARKETS, THE  DIRECTOR  OF  THE
    6  BUDGET,  AND  THE COMMISSIONER OF TAXATION AND FINANCE, THE COMMISSIONER
    7  OF ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT SHALL PROMULGATE RULES AND REGULATIONS GOVERNING
    8  THE ESTABLISHMENT OF AGRICULTURAL EMPIRE ZONES BASED ON RULES AND  REGU-
    9  LATIONS  THAT  GOVERN  THE  STATES EMPIRE ZONES PROGRAM. RULES AND REGU-
   10  LATIONS PROMULGATED BY  THE  COMMISSIONER  OF  ECONOMIC  DEVELOPMENT  IN
   11  CONSULTATION  WITH  THE  COMMISSIONER  OF  AGRICULTURE  AND MARKETS, THE
   12  DIRECTOR OF THE BUDGET, AND THE COMMISSIONER  OF  TAXATION  AND  FINANCE
   13  SHALL  INCLUDE  BUT  NOT  BE LIMITED TO CRITERIA FOR AGRICULTURAL EMPIRE
   14  ZONE ELIGIBILITY, AND THE APPLICATION PROCESS. CRITERIA FOR AGRICULTURAL
   15  EMPIRE ZONE ELIGIBILITY SHALL INCLUDE BUT NOT BE LIMITED TO  AREAS  THAT
   16  HAVE  SUFFERED AN EROSION IN THEIR AGRICULTURAL BASE EITHER THROUGH LOSS
   17  OF FARM LAND OR LOSS OF AGRICULTURE RELATED REVENUE. CRITERIA FOR  AGRI-
   18  CULTURAL EMPIRE ZONE ELIGIBILITY SHALL NOT INCLUDE JOB CREATION.
   19    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   20  it  shall have become a law. Effective immediately, the addition, amend-
   21  ment and/or repeal of any rule or regulation necessary for the implemen-
   22  tation of this act on its effective date is authorized to be made on  or
   23  before such effective date.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the establishment of agricultural empire zones
